title: New Munky Project
excerpt: According to Korn’s official website, James “Munky” Shaffer has announced a new project called FEAR AND THE NERVOUS SYSTEM. Their first album is due out this fall. From the official website: “KoRn guitarist James ‘Munky’ Shaffer announces plans to release a new project entitled FEAR AND THE NERVOUS SYSTEM due out fall of 2008. The … more →
